original: intros K V U F FF l2 l1 f H H0 y H1. unfold filterdiff in *. destruct H as [Hl Hf]. split. - auto. - intros x Fx. specialize (Hf x Fx). unfold is_domin in *. assert (is_filter_lim FF x) as Fx_FF. { apply is_filter_lim_locally_close. auto. } specialize (H0 x Fx_FF). apply eq_close. apply Hf.
